<path>Installing apps, How do I install an app?</path>
# Installing apps
## How do I install an app?
Go to the [Developer Portal](https://developers.reddit.com/apps) and select an app. This opens the app detail page. Click the red **Install** button, select the subreddit you want to add the app to, and presto! Youâ€™ve just installed an app.
![app details](./assets/app-details-5.png)

path: How do I install an app?
